entry.title: new bitcoin.org clients page
entry.summary: The context discusses the best client for Bitcoin-Qt and mentions that this is subjective as everyone's opinion varies. It suggests using a table of features to compile a list of clients and libraries. The writer finds library+client implementations to be nice and the future. They mention two major pairs of these that should be listed. Additionally, they request someone to set the reply-to header for these lists as it is annoying to not have the list address show up when replying.
